name: Endothermic Touch
components: V, S, M/DF (a small bit of snakeskin)
target: one living creature that has the dragon type or the reptilian subtype
text: This spell slows the metabolism and other bodily functions of a creature for a short amount of time. The target is staggered and moves at half its normal speed (round down to the next 5-foot increment), but it can hold its breath for twice as long as normal.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料/法器（一小块蛇皮）
target_zh: 一个龙类或者爬行亚种的活物
text_zh: 这个法术在短时间里减缓一个生物的新陈代谢和其他身体机能。目标恍惚并且速度变为正常的一半（以5尺为单位向下取整），但是它在水下闭气的时间变为通常的两倍。
